imdb.plot outline: Join horror legend Kane Hodder (Friday the 13th Part 7-X, Hatchet 1-3) and the author of his biography, Mike Aloisi, in their insane adventures in The Killer & I. With the fitting title of, Horror s Odd Couple , this mismatched duo of a tough stunt man and a scaredy cat writer are sure to prove that... horror can be hilarious! Documenting their four-month book tour the two get trouble and make fools of themselves (or at least just Mike) on two continents! During their travels Kane makes Mike shoot a gun for the first time, drive ATV s through a desert, get attacked by an elk, go on ghost hunts, hand feed lions and tigers, crash Segway s, explore ancient castles and much, much more.. Kane and Mike will make you laugh so hard... it s scary!
imdb.title: The Killer & I
plot: Horror legend Kane Hodder (Friday the 13th Part 7-X, Hatchet 1-3) and the author of his biography, Mike Aloisi, travel the world and have insane adventures.

Join horror legend Kane Hodder (Friday the 13th Part 7-X, Hatchet 1-3) and the author of his biography, Mike Aloisi, in their insane adventures in _The Killer & I_ (qv). With the fitting title of, Horror s Odd Couple , this mismatched duo of a tough stunt man and a scaredy cat writer are sure to prove that... horror can be hilarious! Documenting their four-month book tour the two get trouble and make fools of themselves (or at least just Mike) on two continents! During their travels Kane makes Mike shoot a gun for the first time, drive ATV s through a desert, get attacked by an elk, go on ghost hunts, hand feed lions and tigers, crash Segway s, explore ancient castles and much, much more.. Kane and Mike will make you laugh so hard... it s scary!
